# selectedOptionIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier of the selected option in the group.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectedOptionIdentifier: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system defaults this value to the first [doc://com.apple.sharedwithyou/documentation/SharedWithYouCore/SWCollaborationOption] identifier.
title: selectedOptionIdentifier
